title: Provisions of chapter controlling
context: ยง48-7 Provisions of chapter controlling. Insofar as this chapter is inconsistent with the provisions of any law or charter, this chapter shall be controlling. The powers conferred by this chapter shall be in addition and supplemental to the powers conferred by any other law or charter. [L 1964, c 58, pt of ยง2; Supp, ยง140A-8; HRS ยง48-7]
